newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.African average T-Bill rate 16.09 pct.
newsitem.headline: S.African average T-Bill rate 16.09 pct.

text.p: The average discount rate for South African three-month Treasury Bills fell to 16.09 percent at the latest weekly tender after rising to 16.19 percent last week, the Reserve Bank said.
Applications for the 600 million rand of bills on offer totalled 2,810 million rand. The average price was 95.990 rand percent.

The average rate for six-month bills was 15.70 percent from 16.06 percent. Applications for the 100 million rand of bills on offer totalled 1,055 million rand. The average price was 92.170 rand percent.
